sociopatterns.statistics.distribution.calculate_contact_duration(Data)¶

Calculates the probabilitys for contact duration

Calculates the probability for having a face-to-face contact for the time delta T

Parameters

Data.interaction (Data) – Contains a dataframe with the tij-data from the dataset

Returns

[y_probability,x_delta_t] – A list with two lists. The first list contains the probabilities for the y-axis and the second list contains the contact duration delta T

Return type

List

Notes

References

Examples

See also

sociopatterns.statistics.distribution.calculate_triangle_duration(), sociopatterns.statistics.distribution.calculate_inter_contact_duration()

sociopatterns.statistics.distribution.calculate_triangle_duration(Data)¶

Calculates the probabilities for the contact duration between triangle constellations

Calculates the probability how long a triangle constellation lasts.

Parameters

Data.interaction (Data) – Contains a dataframe with the tij-data from the dataset

Returns

[y_probability,x_delta_t] – A list with two lists. The first list contains the probabilitys for the y-axis and the second list contains the triangle duration delta T

Return type

List

Notes

References

Examples

See also

sociopatterns.statistics.distribution.calculate_contact_duration(), sociopatterns.statistics.distribution.calculate_inter_contact_duration()

sociopatterns.statistics.distribution.calculate_inter_contact_duration(Data, bins=None)¶

Calculates the probabilities for the inter-contact duration

Calculates the probability for the inter-contact duration delta T of three distinct persons.

Parameters

Data.interaction (Data) – Contains a dataframe with the tij-data from the dataset

Returns

[x_delta_t,y_probability] –

A list with two lists. The first list contains the probabilities for the y-axis and the second list contains

the inter-contact duration tAC-tAB

Return type

List

Notes

References

Examples

See also

sociopatterns.statistics.distribution.calculate_contact_duration(), sociopatterns.statistics.distribution.calculate_triangle_duration()
